title.narrative: 2014 - YALI - Southern Africa Regional Leadership Centre

description.narrative: The YALI partnership seeks to provide high-quality training in business and entrepreneurship, public management, and civic engagement to 12,000 young Africans aged between 18-35 years at four Regional Leadership Centers (RLCs) across Africa. The RLCs are located in Kenya, Ghana, Senegal, and South Africa. The training will act as catalyst for transformational learning and leadership through interactive, experiential education, group projects and simulations, and mentored individual project development. Amount approved by MCF Board in September 2014.

participating-org.narrative: University of South Africa Foundation (UNISA Foundation)
